font.span: The new cyberinfrastructure and wms scenario. A new storage service has been added to the host Jupiter (marked in red).Â Workflow files which are highlighted purple will be read/written from/to the Remote Storage Service (marked purple) while workflow files highlighted red will be read/written from/to the Local Storage Service (marked red).
